item.title: tanker65
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
I am very content from The-7 theme, so I bought it already twice and once more through a client of mine.
I really do not understand why people give 1 star to this theme! This is raised by itself. If there exist somethig wrong with The-7 that would make someone to give 4 –1 star cannot be accepted.

item.title: Ann aka spirittlk
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I am very grateful for your help and I am so thankful I bought this theme. I love it and your customer support has always been amazing. Please tell your boss, you have another very satisfied customer here

item.title: Daniel aka daedubu

item.content:encoded: Thanks for the Update of THE 7, the version 4.3.0 is PERFECT!

item.title: Tania aka tanker65
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Excellent work!!!!
How lucky I feel I chosen this theme! AGAIN!

item.title: lanu39
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: ... You can say that this is a very successful project since it was done 100% by me. A designer with absolutely no knowledge about development. So this proves your theme works like a charm and it is very user friendly.

item.title: mloughran
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This is the best theme ever created. I have zero web design experience and I receive compliments on my website all the time.

item.title: Ken aka webjump
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Just a quick note about The7 – it's just amazing. Everything I throw at it, just works. I am really happy with my purchase and big congrats to the everyone.

item.title: Tony aka CLK
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The customer support the fastest ever seen on Themeforest, thank you.

item.title: Stuart aka myelomauk
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Love the theme, by far the best one I've tried yet. Will be rolling this out to several projects this year. Keep up the great work.

item.title: Stratos aka bl333
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I have already given 5 stars to the theme!!! If only most themes from themeforest had the quality and support that you provide

item.dc:creator: admin

Support is also perfect … !

item.title: Marcus aka 3ddesignbureau
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Thank you very much for all your help resolving the problems we had and helping us to with all our customisation needs.
And also a big thank you for all your team – The 7 is a great theme and you guys are doing supreme job!

item.content:encoded: Would like to congratulate the excellent work done in this new version you deserve every penny paid for theme super satisfied.
